trial_type.Description: Type of event (different from EEGLAB convention)

response_time.Description: Response time column not use for this data

sample.Description: Event sample starting at 0 (Matlab convention starting at 1)

Levels.2: Response 1 (this may be a response to question 1, 2 or 3)
Levels.4: Response 2 (this may be a response to question 1, 2 or 3)
Levels.8: Response 3 (this may be a response to question 1, 2 or 3)
